title: 裝模組後的問題
author: terry2367
txt_content:
我每次裝模組後開地圖,我會出現「shutting down internel server」
出現這個有兩種情況
1.開原有的地圖之後一會兒就出
2.開新地圖後地圖的樣子也沒看到就出左

之後出現了





      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Exception in server tick loop
A full error report has been saved to C:\Users\User\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-04-15_20.59.12-server.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash undefined

C:\Users\User\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-04-15_20.59.12-server.txt
